email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV Horizon Star
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV Horizon Star available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. We are offering a freight rate of $25/MT under CIF terms. The laycan is 25-30 October.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV Horizon Star
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV Horizon Star
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. The best I can do is $23/MT. The demurrage rate is $10,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please let me know if this revised rate works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV Horizon Star
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the update. We can proceed with $23/MT. Please confirm the laycan and send the recap.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV Horizon Star
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: $23/MT CIF
- Laycan: 25-30 October
- Demurrage: $10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV Horizon Star
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The recap looks good. We are all set on our end.

Looking forward to a smooth operation.

Best,
John
